item.title: Sarbej2 add a quote by Janet Evanovich

item.description: "For in every adult there dwells the child that was, and in every child there lies the adult that will be." -- John Connolly

item.title: Sarbej2 add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I think and think and think, Iâ€˜ve thought myself out of happiness one million times, but never once into it." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Sarbej2 add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Sarbej2 add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I'm so afraid of losing something I love that I refuse to love anything" -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Sarbej2 add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "The bruises go away, and so does how you hate, and so does the feeling that everything you receive from life is something you have earned." -- Jonathan Safran Foer
